name: mapreduce.task.timeout
description:
The number of milliseconds before a task will be
  terminated if it neither reads an input, writes an output, nor
  updates its status string.  A value of 0 disables the timeout.

name: mapreduce.job.maxtaskfailures.per.tracker
description:
The number of task-failures on a node manager of a given job
               after which new tasks of that job aren't assigned to it. It
               MUST be less than mapreduce.map.maxattempts and
               mapreduce.reduce.maxattempts otherwise the failed task will
               never be tried on a different node.

name: mapreduce.client.submit.file.replication
description:
The replication level for submitted job files.  This
  should be around the square root of the number of nodes.

name: dfs.namenode.name.cache.threshold
description:
Frequently accessed files that are accessed more times than this
    threshold are cached in the FSDirectory nameCache.

name: ha.health-monitor.sleep-after-disconnect.ms
description: How long to sleep after an unexpected RPC error.
